</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Copy the chain of waypoints from source to target group. The target group will start to process waypoints from the first one. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>group1 copyWaypoints group2;
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
